meanings.definition: Izars (noun): a type of traditional Indian garment worn by women
meanings.sent1: She wore beautiful izars to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The shop displayed a variety of colorful izars.
meanings.sent3: The izars danced in the wind as she twirled around.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of izars was a rainbow of fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The soft silk izars shimmered under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Izars (verb): to cover or wrap with a cloth or garment
meanings.sent1: She izars herself in a warm blanket on chilly nights.
meanings.sent2: The mother gently izars her baby in a soft blanket.
meanings.sent3: He izars the gift in colorful wrapping paper.
meanings.sent4: The magician izars himself in a cloak of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The chef izars the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.

meanings.definition: Izars (adjective): relating to or characteristic of the traditional Indian garment worn by women
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate izars patterns on the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured models in elegant izars designs.
meanings.sent3: The room was decorated with izars-inspired tapestries.
meanings.sent4: Her style was a mix of modern and izars influences.
meanings.sent5: The boutique specialized in unique izars-inspired clothing.
